traits.name: Dual Mind
entries: The Inspired has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The Inspired makes two crysteel dagger attacks. It can replace one attack with vicious mockery.

actions.name: Crysteel Dagger
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Vicious Mockery (Cantrip)
entries: The Inspired unleashes a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can hear the Inspired, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or take 2 (1d4 damage) psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.
